title: Colin Cowherd's Blazing 5: 09/29/2018
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd's Blazing 5: 09/29/2018
description:
Colin is off to a 10-5 start in his Blazing 5 picks this season. In this exclusive podcast RJ Bell of Pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio reviews Colin's week 4 picks and tells him which ones the wise guys in Vegas agree and disagree with. Plus, Colin includes a bonus pick that was not part of his Blazing 5.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
